473930.name: Steam Gift Cards
473930.description:
Visit Best Buy, GameStop, GAME, 7-Eleven, EB Games or your favorite retailer for Steam Gift Cards in a variety of denominations. With Steam Gift Cards, you can add money to your Steam Wallet and enjoy all of your favorite PC, Mac, and SteamOS games.

  • Instant Access to Thousands of Games. Enjoy exclusive deals, cloud saves, automatic game updates and other great perks.
  • Create and Share Content. Gift your friends, trade items, and even create new content for games in the Steam Workshop. Help shape the future of your favorite games.
  • Join the Community. Meet new people, join game groups, form clans, chat in-game and more! With over 100 million potential friends (or enemies), the fun never stops.
  • Entertainment Anywhere. Whether you're on a PC, Mac, Linux box, mobile device, or even your television, you can enjoy the benefits of Steam. Take the fun with you.
473930.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 保加利亚语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 泰语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语
